context-menu-icons.name: Context Menu Icons

context-menu-icons.author: Starry-AXQG

87196c08-8ca1-4848-b13b-7ea41ee830e7.name: Tab Preview Enhanced
87196c08-8ca1-4848-b13b-7ea41ee830e7.description: Enhanced tab preview, respecting user background color and padding

599a1599-e6ab-4749-ab22-de533860de2c.name: Pimp your PiP
599a1599-e6ab-4749-ab22-de533860de2c.description: Collection of tweaks and upgrades to PiP
599a1599-e6ab-4749-ab22-de533860de2c.author: shldk

f7c71d9a-bce2-420f-ae44-a64bd92975ab.name: Better Unloaded Tabs
f7c71d9a-bce2-420f-ae44-a64bd92975ab.description: Makes unloaded tabs easier to notice by making them greyscale and transparent.

a6335949-4465-4b71-926c-4a52d34bc9c0.name: Better Find Bar
a6335949-4465-4b71-926c-4a52d34bc9c0.description: Improves the find bar, making it floating with theme match and customization.

79dde383-4fe7-404a-a8e6-9be440022542.name: Tidy Popup
79dde383-4fe7-404a-a8e6-9be440022542.description: Modifies popup panels, changing divider lines with empty spacer, and makes the button more compact.

8039de3b-72e1-41ea-83b3-5077cf0f98d1.name: Trackpad Animation
8039de3b-72e1-41ea-83b3-5077cf0f98d1.description: adds backward and forward animation for trackpad gesture

20e8cc78-3dac-4db0-81a4-814672fb50af.name: Left Side Glance Buttons
20e8cc78-3dac-4db0-81a4-814672fb50af.description: Move the at a glance buttons to the left side of the window.

4c2bec61-7f6c-4e5c-bdc6-c9ad1aba1827.name: Vertical Split Tab Groups
4c2bec61-7f6c-4e5c-bdc6-c9ad1aba1827.description: Display tab groups created from split tabs as vertical lists instead of horizontal ones.

c9ee0d97-d2d6-40fd-8f85-549fe000b868.name: Deta Loading Bar
c9ee0d97-d2d6-40fd-8f85-549fe000b868.description: A sleek animated loading bar that appears at the top of the page during loading, similar to Deta Surf browser. Features customizable colors, gradient effects, blur animation, adjustable thickness, and optional box shadows. Integrates with Zen Browser's theme colors or use custom colors and width.
c9ee0d97-d2d6-40fd-8f85-549fe000b868.author: rasyidrafi

ad97bb70-0066-4e42-9b5f-173a5e42c6fc.name: SuperPins
ad97bb70-0066-4e42-9b5f-173a5e42c6fc.description: This Zen Mod enhances pinned tabs/Essentials, by making some UI/UX changes.
ad97bb70-0066-4e42-9b5f-173a5e42c6fc.author: CosmoCreeper

2317fd93-c3ed-4f37-b55a-304c1816819e.name: Audio Indicator Enhanced
2317fd93-c3ed-4f37-b55a-304c1816819e.description: Enhanced audio indicator, with more polished style (New Visualizer Mode)
